title: Molten Skull Rose
summaries: The Molten Skull Rose is an accessory that represents the final upgrade of the Obsidian Skull. It grants melee weapons the ability to inflict Hellfire debuff, grants immunity from fire blocks, and reduces damage taken from lava. When worn, the item can be seen on the players head.
This item can also be crafted in three different ways.

statistics.Tooltip:
Melee attacks inflict fire damage
Grants immunity to fire blocks
Reduces damage from touching lava
statistics.Sell: 5
